**Tender Description**

The Government of Canada is seeking bids for the supply of Irrigation Pumps, to be used for irrigation water supply from in-ground ponds to agricultural research fields at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Kentville Research and Development Centre (Kentville RDC) farm. The requirements are detailed in the resulting contract clauses.

**Key Dates:**

* The period of the contract is until March 31, 2023, inclusive.
* Delivery is requested by March 31, 2023.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidder instructions and specifications may be found in the attached solicitation package.

**Contact Information:**

For further information or to request a bid package, please contact Brian Secord at [brian.secord@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.secord@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca) or (782) 641-6170. Bidder instructions and specifications may be found in the attached solicitation package. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
